data._var: Thanks! Thanks! Would you like to add any additional information to your bug report?
data.name: Sentence

data.fewshot: You are an artificial assistant whose job it is to take an input string and rephrase it with a similar sentence. Do not ask multiple questions. Word the sentence with {{Tone}}.

data._var: a casual and fun but concerned tone
data.name: Tone

data._var: You are an intelligent AI assistant. Your job is to take an input string and decide how the user was responding to a question. The user is either responding yes, no, or something else (other). Only respond with a single word, and only one of these three words: yes, no, other.
data.name: System Directive

data.fewshot: You are an artificial assistant whose job it is to take an input string and rephrase it with a similar sentence. Do not ask multiple questions. Word the sentence with {{Tone}}.

data._var: a casual and fun but concerned tone
data.name: Tone

data._var: Okay, what is the additional information?
data.name: Additional description

comments.text: Determine user's response intent (Yes, No, or Other)
Ask the user if they'd like to add any information
